FuncDef: This command monitors statistics for a PIM source group.
CLIs: group <grp-ip-address> [ source <ip-address> ] [ interval <interval> ] [ repeat <repeat> ] [ absolute | rate ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IP address of an multicast group that identifies a set of recipients that are interested in a particular data stream.
Specifies the source IP address to use in the ping requests in dotted decimal notation. Values-0.0.0.0 to 255.255.255.255. ParamDefault: Default- the IP address of the egress IP interface
Configures the interval for each display, in seconds. Values-10, 20, 30, 40, 50, 60. ParamDefault: Default- 10
Configures how many times the command is repeated. Values-1 to 999. ParamDefault: Default- 10
Displays raw statistics, without processing. No calculations are performed on the delta or rate statistics.
Displays rate-per-second for each statistic instead of the delta.
